column5: hey guys, i am going up to upper buckhorn lake tomorrow morning and need some advice. i usually go to upper buckhorn every year fora week but toward the end of june to fsh muskie. i have done amazing on them ever but im not sure what i sould be tring this late in july. usuallyi fish deeper weed edges but now i am notsure. should i stick to deeper or should i be burning blades over weeds and reeds? any help?  thanks
Simply troll big lures in deep water of Gannow Narrow. There should be a few big ones around there However I would rather wait until weather becomes cold. This weekend seems humid.
